cells.text: SUN HUNG KAI PROPERTIES INSURANCE LTD
新鴻基地產保險有限公司

Rm2309-16 Sun Hung Kai Centre,
30 Harbour Road, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
Telephone: 2827 8111 Facsimile: 2827 0622
Website: http://www.sunsuninsurance.com.hk
E-Mail: shk@skp.com.hk
CLAIM FORM 賠償申請表格

甲項                          投保人資料
SECTION A              INSURED'S INFORMATION

(3) Home Tel.
辦事處電話
Office Tel.
電子郵件
E-mail Address

For Office Use Only 公司專用
Date Submitted

乙項       SECTION B
索償資料     CLAIM INFORMATION
(一) 意外或損失發生日期
(二) 請詳述意外或損失發生的情形
(2) State the circumstances of the loss or damage with full particulars
(三) 如遇盜竊，請詳述發生經過的情形(竊匿從何處進入屋內)？
(3) In the case of Theft, please give full details showing how access to the property was effected
(4) Amount claimed (for details see overleaf) (詳情請閱前頁)
(五) 索償者是否財物之唯一主人？
(5) Is the Claimant the sole owner of the property lost for damaged?
(六) 是否有其他保險保障該財物？若有，請詳述承保公司，保額及保險種類
(6) Are there any other insurances upon the same property? If yes, please give full particulars.
(七) 以前曾否遭遇同樣性質的損失？若有，請詳述之
(7) Has the claimant sustained other losses of the same nature? If yes, please give full particulars.

時間

地點

Place

HKD

(五) 索償者是否財物之唯一主人？

(5) Is the Claimant the sole owner of the property lost for damaged?

是 Yes

否 No

(六) 是否有其他保險保障該財物？若有，請詳述承保公司，保額及保險種類

(6) Are there any other insurances upon the same property? If yes, please give full particulars.

是 Yes

否 No

(七) 以前曾否遭遇同樣性質的損失？若有，請詳述之

(7) Has the claimant sustained other losses of the same nature? If yes, please give full particulars.

是 Yes

否 No
